Welcome to Statistics

About The Course

In this course, we will:

  1. Develop skills in using statistical software tools (e.g., spreadsheets).
  2. Determine the correct statistical procedures to use in a given situation.
  3. Explain how the Central Limit Theorem applies in inference.
  4. Interpret the meaning of confidence intervals in context.
  5. Interpret the results of hypothesis tests.
  6. Make informed decisions, based on the results of inferential procedures.
  7. Develop skills and confidence as a disciple leader.

How to Get Started

The first thing you will need to do is study the following links to meet your instructor and familiarize yourself with the course and learning management system.  Just click on the table of contents and start browsing through the Course Resources Folder.  If you have not taken the I-Learn 3.0 Tour yet, please do so as it will introduce you to some of the features of I-Learn that are new.
